attributes.action: Make it illegal to profit from the selling of puppies.
attributes.additional_details: The pounds send a list, every week, of all the dogs they have to the rescue centres. If the centres can’t take these thousands of unwanted dogs within a week, it’s curtains, because the pounds are full to bursting, but more and more dogs are pouring in daily, from useless or panicked owners, and misguided or greedy breeders. So an estimated 21 dogs a day are put down in England. It would take at least five years of nobody breeding any dogs at all to get our dogs down to a manageable level.
attributes.background: There are thousands of unwanted dogs in rescue centres in the Uk. These are bred by unscrupulous people that are out to make a profit. If we had some kind of regulation in place about the breeding of dogs we could limit the amount of homeless and ill treated dogs.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you'd like dog breeding to be regulated or whether you'd like it to be illegal to profit from selling puppies or dogs. 

If you'd like "Tighter Regulations On Dog Breeding and Make Neutering and Spaying Compulsory" you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200245

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
